sentences.sContent: She didn’t want to confront the inescapable fact that she would have to sell the house.
sentences.sCn: 她不想面对必须卖掉房子这一无法逃避的事实。

sentences.sContent: The inescapable conclusion is that he was murdered by someone in his own family.
sentences.sCn: 必然的结论就是: 他是被自己的家人谋杀的。

synos.tran: 不可避免的；逃脱不了的

trans.tranOther: an inescapable fact or situation is one that you cannot avoid or ignore
